content: My training data only goes up to october 2021 and i don't have real-time access to information that is constantly changing. however, many bars and pubs in chennai offer happy hour specials, and it's likely that gatsby 2000 might have some promotions as well. i recommend checking their website or social media pages for more information on their happy hour deals, as well as their operating hours and any covid-19 related guidelines. additionally, you can also call them to enquire about their happy hour specials and make a reservation, if required.
